info.title: Recipe DB API Endpoint Playground
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for accessing 118,000+ recipes, nutritional data, and meal planning features.

tags.name: POST Method
tags.description: Create meal plans based on user preferences

get.description: Retrieves a comprehensive list of all available recipes in the database.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Returns a single, randomly selected recipe to be featured as the 'Recipe of the Day'.
Generates a 'Recipe of the Day' while excluding specific ingredients or food categories.
Provides macronutrient details (calories, fat, protein, carbohydrates) for recipes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Provides detailed micronutrient data (vitamins, minerals, cholesterol) for recipes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Filters recipes based on preparation, cooking and total time ranges.

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: Filter by time value range (in minutes) for the selected field.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Filter by time value range (in minutes) for the selected field.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The time field (in minutes) to filter on.

get.description: Filters recipes belonging to a specific culinary region or sub-region.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Time field (in minutes) to filter on.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Searches for recipes by title with partial matching support.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Select title category of the recipe.

get.description: Filters recipes within a specific minimum and maximum calorie range.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Combines regional cuisine filtering with dietary preferences (e.g., Italian + Vegan).

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Filter by region of the recipe.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Filters recipes according to specific dietary restrictions like Vegan or Vegetarian.

get.description: Filters recipes based on their carbohydrate content range.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Fetches step-by-step cooking instructions for a specific recipe.

parameters.name: recipe_id
parameters.description: Enter recipe_id of the recipe to fetch cooking instructions for.

post.description: Generates a personalized meal plan for a specified duration based on diet and calories.

days.description: Number of days for the meal plan

exclude_ingredients.description: Ingredients to exclude from the meal plan

get.description: Filters recipes based on primary flavor profiles or ingredient categories.

get.description: Filters recipes by specific cooking methods (e.g., Frying, Baking).
Filters recipes by energy content (kcal), often used for energy density analysis.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Advanced search allowing simultaneous filtering by ingredients, categories, and title.

parameters.name: includeIngredients
parameters.description: Select one or more ingredients to include.

parameters.name: excludeIngredients
parameters.description: Select one or more ingredients to exclude.

parameters.name: includeCategories
parameters.description: Select one or more categories to include.

parameters.name: excludeCategories
parameters.description: Select one or more categories to exclude.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Select title category of the recipe.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recipes to be shown per page.

get.description: Filters recipes based on inclusion or exclusion of specific food categories in DietRx.

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description:
To access the API, provide a valid JWT token in the 'Authorization' header. The 'Bearer' prefix is automatically added, so you only need to enter the token itself. The token is generated by the API.

Example value: <API_KEY>
